channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-10550] Register HBase tokens with ServiceLoader
item.description: Set up ServiceLoader for HBase auth tokens.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Without this change, we get warnings from Hadoop's Token class that a classloader cannot be found for our AuthenticationTokenIdentifier. Attached patch fixes the warnings by wiring up ServiceLoader to AuthenticationTokenIdentifier, and also adds checks that classloading is working.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12629246/10550.patch
against trunk revision .
ATTACHMENT ID: 12629246

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 7 new or modified tests.

-1 hadoop1.0. The patch failed to compile against the hadoop 1.0 profile.
Here is snippet of errors:
